mapper.select: select p.pid, p.email, p.nickname, p.content, p.title, p.created, p.updated, p.likes from post p, user u where p.email=u.email and u.email=#{email}
mapper.insert: insert into post(email,nickname,content,title, created, updated, likes,description,thumbnail) values(#{email},#{nickname},#{content}, #{title},curdate(), curdate(), 0,#{description},#{thumbnail})
mapper.select: select * from post where content like concat('%',#{q},'%') or title like concat('%',#{q},'%') order by updated limit #{startPage}, #{endPage}
